cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-destructor.description:
Description

This check implements
C.37
from the C++ Core Guidelines.

The
cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-destructor
check is an alias, please see
performance-noexcept-destructor
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-noexcept-destructor.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
